articles.description: Cate Blanchett, Guillermo del Toro, Bill Nighy and more stars stepped out on the 2023 Oscars red carpet with blue ribbons. What for?
articles.content:
Cate Blanchett, Guillermo del Toro, Bill Nighy and more stars stepped out on the Oscars red (er, champagne) carpet with blue ribbons.
But why? What for? The #WithRefugees ribbons are associated with… [+2324 chars]

articles.author: Ethan Anderton
articles.title: Wednesday's Jenna Ortega Cuts Loose And Saves Us From A Saturday Night Live Slump - /Film
articles.description: Jenna Ortega showed impressive comedic chops in her hosting debut on Saturday Night Live, and she ended the recent three-episode run on a much needed high note.
articles.content: The Parent Trap Coming in close behind the Waffle House sketch, we have this throwback to Lindsay Lohan's remake of "The Parent Trap" from 1998. Strangely enough, Jenna Ortega was born four years aft… [+2959 chars]
